title.text: RFC 4131: Management Information Base for Data Over Cable Service Interface Specification (DOCSIS) Cable Modems and Cable Modem Termination Systems for Baseline Privacy Plus

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                           S. Green
Request for Comments: 4131                                    Consultant
Category: Standards Track                                       K. Ozawa
                                                                 Toshiba
                                                         E. Cardona, Ed.

Management Information Base for Data Over Cable Service Interface Specification (DOCSIS) Cable Modems and Cable Modem Termination Systems for Baseline Privacy Plus
contents.zh-CHS: 用于基线隐私升级的电缆数据服务接口规范（DOCSIS）电缆调制解调器和电缆调制解调器终端系统的管理信息库

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it defines a set of managed objects for Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) based management of the Baseline Privacy Plus features of DOCSIS 1.1 and DOCSIS 2.0 (Data-over-Cable Service Interface Specification) compliant Cable Modems and Cable Modem Termination Systems.
contents.zh-CHS: 此备忘录定义了管理信息库（MIB）的一部分，用于Internet社区中的网络管理协议。特别是，它定义了一组管理对象，用于基于简单网络管理协议（SNMP）的基线隐私管理，以及符合DOCSIS 1.1和DOCSIS 2.0（有线数据服务接口规范）的电缆调制解调器和电缆调制解调器终端系统的功能。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. The Internet-Standard Management Framework
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 因特网标准管理框架

contents.text: For a detailed overview of the documents that describe the current Internet-Standard Management Framework, please refer to section 7 of RFC 3410 [RFC3410].
contents.zh-CHS: 有关描述当前互联网标准管理框架的文件的详细概述，请参阅RFC 3410[RFC3410]第7节。

contents.text: Managed objects are accessed via a virtual information store, termed the Management Information Base or MIB. MIB objects are generally accessed through the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP). Objects in the MIB are defined using the mechanisms defined in the Structure of Management Information (SMI). This memo specifies a MIB module that is compliant to the SMIv2, which is described in STD 58, RFC 2578 [RFC2578], STD 58, RFC 2579 [RFC2579] and STD 58, RFC 2580 [RFC2580].
contents.zh-CHS: 托管对象通过虚拟信息存储（称为管理信息库或MIB）进行访问。MIB对象通常通过简单网络管理协议（SNMP）进行访问。MIB中的对象是使用管理信息结构（SMI）中定义的机制定义的。本备忘录规定了符合SMIv2的MIB模块，如STD 58、RFC 2578[RFC2578]、STD 58、RFC 2579[RFC2579]和STD 58、RFC 2580[RFC2580]所述。

contents.text: 2. Overview
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 概述

contents.text: This MIB module (BPI+ MIB) provides a set of objects required for the management of the Baseline Privacy Interface Plus features of DOCSIS 1.1 and DOCSIS 2.0 Cable Modem (CM) and Cable Modem Termination System (CMTS). The specification is derived from the operational model described in the DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Interface Plus Specification [DOCSIS].
contents.zh-CHS: 该MIB模块（BPI+MIB）提供了基线隐私接口管理所需的一组对象，以及DOCSIS 1.1和DOCSIS 2.0电缆调制解调器（CM）和电缆调制解调器终端系统（CMTS）的功能。该规范源自DOCSIS基线隐私接口规范[DOCSIS]中描述的操作模型。

contents.text: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus is composed of four distinct functional and manageable areas:
contents.zh-CHS: DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus由四个不同的功能和可管理区域组成：

contents.text: o Key exchange and data encryption
contents.zh-CHS: o 密钥交换和数据加密

contents.text: o Cable modem authentication
contents.zh-CHS: o 电缆调制解调器认证

contents.text: o Multicast encryption
contents.zh-CHS: o 多播加密

contents.text: o Authentication of downloaded software images
contents.zh-CHS: o 下载软件映像的身份验证

contents.text: This MIB module is an extension of the DOCSIS 1.0 Baseline Privacy MIB module [RFC3083] (BPI MIB), which is derived from the Operational model described in the DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Interface Specification [DOCSIS-1.0]. The original Baseline Privacy MIB structure has mostly been preserved in the Baseline Privacy Plus MIB. Please note that the referenced DOCSIS specifications only require that Cable Modems process IPv4 customer traffic. Design choices in this MIB module reflect those requirements. Future versions of the DOCSIS specifications are expected to require support for IPv6 as well.
contents.zh-CHS: 该MIB模块是DOCSIS 1.0基线隐私MIB模块[RFC3083]（BPI MIB）的扩展，该模块源自DOCSIS基线隐私接口规范[DOCSIS-1.0]中描述的操作模型。原始的基线隐私MIB结构大部分保留在基线隐私加MIB中。请注意，参考的DOCSIS规范仅要求电缆调制解调器处理IPv4客户流量。此MIB模块中的设计选择反映了这些需求。DOCSIS规范的未来版本预计也需要对IPv6的支持。

contents.text: Conventions Used in This Document
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中使用的公约

contents.text: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in BCP 14, RFC 2119 [RFC2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“必需”、“应”、“不应”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照BCP 14、RFC 2119[RFC2119]中的说明进行解释。

contents.text: 2.1. Structure of the MIB
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1. MIB的结构

contents.text: This MIB module is structured into several tables and objects.
contents.zh-CHS: 这个MIB模块被构造成几个表和对象。

contents.text: 2.1.1. Cable Modem
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.1. 电缆调制解调器

contents.text: o The docsBpi2CmBaseTable contains authorization key exchange information for one CM MAC interface.
contents.zh-CHS: o docsBpi2CmBaseTable包含一个CM MAC接口的授权密钥交换信息。

contents.text: o The docsBpi2CmTEKTable contains traffic key exchange and data encryption information for a particular security association ID of the cable modem.
contents.zh-CHS: o docsBpi2CmTEKTable包含电缆调制解调器特定安全关联ID的通信密钥交换和数据加密信息。

contents.text: o Multicast Encryption information is maintained under Docsbpi2CmMulticastObjects. There is currently one multicast table object that manages IP multicast encryption, docsBpi2CmIpMulticastMapTable.
contents.zh-CHS: o 多播加密信息在Docsbpi2CmMulticastObjects下维护。目前有一个管理IP多播加密的多播表对象docsBpi2CmIpMulticastMapTable。

contents.text: o Digital certificates used for cable modem authentication are accessible via docsBpi2CmDeviceCertTable.
contents.zh-CHS: o 用于电缆调制解调器身份验证的数字证书可通过DOCSBPI2CMDeviceCertable访问。

contents.text: o Cryptographic suite capabilities for a CM MAC are maintained in the docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteTable.
contents.zh-CHS: o CM MAC的加密套件功能保存在docsBpi2CmCryptoSuiteTable中。

contents.text: 2.1.2. Cable Modem Termination System
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.2. 电缆调制解调器终端系统

contents.text: o The docsBpi2CmtsBaseTable contains default settings and summary counters for the cable modem termination system.
contents.zh-CHS: o docsBpi2CmtsBaseTable包含电缆调制解调器终端系统的默认设置和摘要计数器。

contents.text: o The DocsBpi2CmtsAuthTable contains Authorization Key Exchange information for each CM MAC interface, as well as data from CM certificates used in cable modem authentication.
contents.zh-CHS: o DocsBpi2CmtsAuthTable包含每个CM MAC接口的授权密钥交换信息，以及用于电缆调制解调器身份验证的CM证书中的数据。

contents.text: o The docsBpi2CmtsTEKTable contains traffic key exchange and data encryption information for a particular security association ID.
contents.zh-CHS: o docsBpi2CmtsTEKTable包含特定安全关联ID的流量密钥交换和数据加密信息。

contents.text: o Multicast Encryption information is maintained under Docsbpi2CmtsMulticastObjects. There are currently two multicast table objects. The Table docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapTable is
contents.zh-CHS: o 多播加密信息在Docsbpi2CmtsMulticastObjects下维护。当前有两个多播表对象。docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapTable表为

contents.text: specifically designed for IP multicast encryption, whereas docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthTable is meant to manage all multicast security associations.
contents.zh-CHS: 专为IP多播加密而设计，而docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthTable旨在管理所有多播安全关联。

contents.text: In particular, the table docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapTable defines the object docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMask, which could be a non-contiguous netmask; this is why the object syntax is based on the INET-ADDRESS-MIB MIB Module [RFC4001] Textual Convention InetAddress instead of InetAddressPrefixLength.
contents.zh-CHS: 具体而言，表docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapTable定义了对象docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMask，该对象可以是非连续网络掩码；这就是为什么对象语法基于INET-ADDRESS-MIB MIB模块[RFC4001]文本约定InetAddress而不是InetAddressPrefixLength。

contents.text: This is to facilitate the assignment of same DOCSIS Security Association ID (SAID) to one or more IPv6 multicast group IDs matching one or more IPv6 multicast scope types within an entry in this table. For example, multicast scopes labeled "unassigned" [RFC3513] may be allocated by administrators to a particular SAID, regardless of their multicast scope; such mapping transient multicast group 'Y' to SAID 'z' for ANY multicast scope. The non-contiguous netmask will be FF10:Y. See [RFC3513] for details on IPv6 multicast addressing.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是为了便于将相同的DOCSIS安全关联ID（SAED）分配给一个或多个IPv6多播组ID，该组ID与此表中一个条目内的一个或多个IPv6多播作用域类型匹配。例如，标记为“未分配”的多播作用域[RFC3513]可由管理员分配给特定的所述多播，而不管其多播作用域如何；对于任何多播作用域，将临时多播组“Y”映射到所述“z”。非连续网络掩码将为FF10:Y。有关IPv6多播寻址的详细信息，请参阅[RFC3513]。

contents.text: o DocsBpi2CmtsCertObjects contains 2 manageable tables: one for provisioned cable modem certificates and one for certification authority certificates.
contents.zh-CHS: o DocsBpi2CmtsCertObjects包含2个可管理的表：一个用于配置的电缆调制解调器证书，另一个用于证书颁发机构证书。

contents.text: 2.1.3. Common
o The docsBpi2CodeDownloadControl objects manage the authenticated software download process for a given device.
contents.zh-CHS: o docsBpi2CodeDownloadControl对象管理给定设备的经过身份验证的软件下载过程。

contents.text: 2.2. Relationship of BPI+ and BPI MIB Modules
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2. BPI+与BPI-MIB模块的关系

contents.text: This section describes the relationship between the BPI+ MIB module defined in this document and the BPI MIB module defined in RFC 3083 [RFC3083]. The BPI+ protocol interface is an enhancement to the BPI protocol, and it is a distinct protocol from BPI. The associated BPI+ managed objects should be considered separate from the BPI MIB objects defined in RFC 3083.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述了本文档中定义的BPI+MIB模块与RFC 3083[RFC3083]中定义的BPI MIB模块之间的关系。BPI+协议接口是对BPI协议的增强，它是与BPI不同的协议。应将关联的BPI+托管对象视为与RFC 3083中定义的BPI MIB对象分开。

contents.text: DOCSIS 1.1 and 2.0 systems implement both the BPI+ and BPI protocols to be backward compatible with 1.0 systems. For more information regarding the interoperability between BPI and BPI+ compliant systems, refer to appendix C of the DOCSIS BPI+ specification [DOCSIS]. For MIB modules requirements, refer to section 4.6.1, Figure 9, of the DOCSIS 1.1 OSSI specification [DOCSIS-1.1] and to section 7.6.1, Tables 7-9, of the DOCSIS 2.0 OSSI specification [DOCSIS-2.0].
contents.zh-CHS: DOCSIS 1.1和2.0系统实现了BPI+和BPI协议，以便与1.0系统向后兼容。有关BPI和BPI+兼容系统之间互操作性的更多信息，请参阅DOCSIS BPI+规范[DOCSIS]的附录C。有关MIB模块要求，请参考DOCSIS 1.1 OSI规范[DOCSIS-1.1]第4.6.1节图9和DOCSIS 2.0 OSI规范[DOCSIS-2.0]第7.6.1节表7-9。

contents.text: 2.3. BPI+ MIB Module Relationship with the Interfaces Group MIB
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3. BPI+MIB模块与接口组MIB的关系

contents.text: The BPI+ MIB module is the management framework of Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification [DOCSIS], which provides the MAC layer (Media Access Control) security services of DOCSIS through the Baseline Privacy Key Management (BPKM) protocol. The BPI+ MIB module objects are organized as extensions of the Radio Frequency (RF) Interface Management [RFC2670].
contents.zh-CHS: BPI+MIB模块是基线隐私加接口规范[DOCSIS]的管理框架，通过基线隐私密钥管理（BPKM）协议提供DOCSIS的MAC层（媒体访问控制）安全服务。BPI+MIB模块对象被组织为射频（RF）接口管理[RFC2670]的扩展。

contents.text: The MIB table structures of this MIB Module are extensions of the DOCSIS CATV (Community Antenna Television) MAC layer interface (DocsCableMaclayer by [IANA]). In particular, the provisions of the Interface Group MIB [RFC2863] for counter discontinuities and system re-initialization apply to CM and CMTS to validate the difference between two consecutive counter polls.
contents.zh-CHS: 该MIB模块的MIB表结构是DOCSIS CATV（社区天线电视）MAC层接口（由[IANA]提供的DOCSCABLEMACLLAYER）的扩展。特别是，接口组MIB[RFC2863]中关于计数器不连续性和系统重新初始化的规定适用于CM和CMT，以验证两个连续计数器轮询之间的差异。

contents.text: All BPI+ MIB module counters are 32 bits and are based on the minimum time to wrap up considerations of [RFC2863] and their possible frequency occurrence as BPI+ FSM (Finite State Machine) event counters. See [DOCSIS] for BPI+ FSM parameter guidelines.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有BPI+MIB模块计数器均为32位，并基于[RFC2863]的最短结束时间考虑因素及其作为BPI+FSM（有限状态机）事件计数器可能出现的频率。有关BPI+FSM参数指南，请参见[DOCSIS]。

contents.text: 3. Definitions
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 定义

contents.text: DOCS-IETF-BPI2-MIB DEFINITIONS ::= BEGIN

IMPORTS
        MODULE-IDENTITY, OBJECT-TYPE,
        Integer32,
        Unsigned32,
        Counter32,
        mib-2
             FROM SNMPv2-SMI           -- [RFC2578]
        SnmpAdminString
             FROM SNMP-FRAMEWORK-MIB   -- [RFC3411]
        TEXTUAL-CONVENTION,
        MacAddress,
        RowStatus,
        TruthValue,
        DateAndTime,
        StorageType
             FROM SNMPv2-TC            -- [RFC2579]
        OBJECT-GROUP,
        MODULE-COMPLIANCE
             FROM SNMPv2-CONF          -- [RFC2580]
        ifIndex
             FROM IF-MIB               -- [RFC2863]
        InetAddressType,
        InetAddress
FROM INET-ADDRESS-MIB; -- [RFC4001]
contents.zh-CHS: 从INET-ADDRESS-MIB；——[RFC4001]

contents.text:
REVISION        "200507200000Z"  -- July 20, 2005
DESCRIPTION
    "Initial version of the IETF BPI+ MIB module.
     This version published as RFC 4131."
   ::= { mib-2 126 }
-- Textual conventions
contents.zh-CHS: --文本约定

contents.text:
DocsX509ASN1DEREncodedCertificate ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
        STATUS    current
        DESCRIPTION
            "An X509 digital certificate encoded as an ASN.1 DER
        object."
        SYNTAX    OCTET STRING (SIZE (0..4096))

DocsSAId ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
        DISPLAY-HINT "d"
        STATUS    current
        DESCRIPTION
             "Security Association identifier (SAID)."
        REFERENCE
              "DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface
        specification, Section 2.1.3, BPI+ Security
        Associations"
        SYNTAX    Integer32 (1..16383)

DocsSAIdOrZero ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
        DISPLAY-HINT "d"
        STATUS    current
        DESCRIPTION
             "Security Association identifier (SAID).  The value
        zero indicates that the SAID is yet to be determined."
        REFERENCE
              "DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface
        specification, Section 2.1.3, BPI+ Security
              Associations"
        SYNTAX    Unsigned32 (0 | 1..16383)

DocsBpkmSAType ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
        STATUS    current
        DESCRIPTION
             "The type of security association (SA).
        The values of the named-numbers are associated
        with the BPKM SA-Type attributes:
        'primary' corresponds to code '1', 'static' to code '2',

and 'dynamic' to code '3'.
The 'none' value must only be used if the SA type has yet
to be determined."
REFERENCE
      "DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface
specification, Section 4.2.2.24"
SYNTAX    INTEGER {
               none(0),
               primary(1),
               static(2),
               dynamic(3)
          }

DocsBpkmDataEncryptAlg ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
        STATUS    current
        DESCRIPTION
            "The list of data encryption algorithms defined for
        the DOCSIS interface in the BPKM cryptographic-suite
        parameter.  The value 'none' indicates that the SAID
        being referenced has no data encryption."
        REFERENCE
             "DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification,
        Section 4.2.2.20."
        SYNTAX    INTEGER {
                       none(0),
                       des56CbcMode(1),
                       des40CbcMode(2),
                       t3Des128CbcMode(3),
                       aes128CbcMode(4),
                       aes256CbcMode(5)
                  }

DocsBpkmDataAuthentAlg ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
        STATUS    current
        DESCRIPTION
            "The list of data integrity algorithms defined for the
        DOCSIS interface in the BPKM cryptographic-suite parameter.
        The value 'none' indicates that no data integrity is used for
        the SAID being referenced."
        REFERENCE
             "DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification,
        Section 4.2.2.20."
        SYNTAX    INTEGER {
                       none(0),
                       hmacSha196(1)
                  }
docsBpi2MIBObjects  OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { docsBpi2MIB 1 }
-- Cable Modem Group
contents.zh-CHS: --电缆调制解调器组

contents.text: docsBpi2CmObjects OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { docsBpi2MIBObjects 1 }

--
-- The BPI+ base and authorization table for CMs,
-- indexed by ifIndex
--

docsBpi2CmBaseTable OBJECT-TYPE
     SYNTAX              SEQUENCE OF    DocsBpi2CmBaseEntry
     MAX-ACCESS          not-accessible
     STATUS              current
     DESCRIPTION
          "This table describes the basic and authorization-
     related Baseline Privacy Plus attributes of each CM MAC
     interface."
     ::= { docsBpi2CmObjects 1 }

docsBpi2CmBaseEntry OBJECT-TYPE
     SYNTAX              DocsBpi2CmBaseEntry
     MAX-ACCESS          not-accessible
     STATUS              current
     DESCRIPTION
          "Each entry contains objects describing attributes of
     one CM MAC interface.  An entry in this table exists for
     each ifEntry with an ifType of docsCableMaclayer(127)."
     INDEX               { ifIndex }
     ::= { docsBpi2CmBaseTable 1 }

DocsBpi2CmBaseEntry ::= SEQUENCE {
     docsBpi2CmPrivacyEnable             TruthValue,
     docsBpi2CmPublicKey                 OCTET STRING,
     docsBpi2CmAuthState                 INTEGER,
     docsBpi2CmAuthKeySequenceNumber     Integer32,
     docsBpi2CmAuthExpiresOld            DateAndTime,
     docsBpi2CmAuthExpiresNew            DateAndTime,
     docsBpi2CmAuthReset                 TruthValue,
     docsBpi2CmAuthGraceTime             Integer32,
     docsBpi2CmTEKGraceTime              Integer32,

docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmReset  OBJECT-TYPE
     SYNTAX    INTEGER   {
                         noResetRequested(1),
                         invalidateAuth(2),
                         sendAuthInvalid(3),
                         invalidateTeks(4)
                         }
     MAX-ACCESS     read-write
     STATUS         current

DESCRIPTION
     "Setting this object to invalidateAuth(2) causes the
CMTS to invalidate the current CM authorization key(s), but
not to transmit an Authorization Invalid message nor to
invalidate the primary SAID's TEKs.  Setting this object to
sendAuthInvalid(3) causes the CMTS to invalidate the
current CM authorization key(s), and to transmit an
Authorization Invalid message to the CM, but not to
invalidate the primary SAID's TEKs.  Setting this object to
invalidateTeks(4) causes the CMTS to invalidate the current
CM authorization key(s), to transmit an Authorization
Invalid message to the CM, and to invalidate the TEKs
associated with this CM's primary SAID.
For BPI mode, substitute all of the CM's unicast
TEKs for the primary SAID's TEKs in the previous
paragraph.
Reading this object returns the most recently set
value of this object or, if the object has not been set
since entry creation, returns noResetRequested(1)."
REFERENCE
     "DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification,
Sections 4.1.2.3.4, 4.1.2.3.5, and 4.1.3.3.5."

docsBpi2CmtsAuthBpkmCmCertValid         OBJECT-TYPE
     SYNTAX    INTEGER {
                       unknown (0),
                       validCmChained (1),
                       validCmTrusted (2),
                       invalidCmUntrusted (3),
                       invalidCAUntrusted (4),
                       invalidCmOther (5),
                       invalidCAOther (6)
                       }
     MAX-ACCESS     read-only
     STATUS    current
     DESCRIPTION
          "Contains the reason why a CM's certificate is deemed
     valid or invalid.
     Return unknown(0) if the CM is running BPI mode.
     ValidCmChained(1) means the certificate is valid
        because it chains to a valid certificate.
     ValidCmTrusted(2) means the certificate is valid
        because it has been provisioned (in the
        docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCert table) to be trusted.
     InvalidCmUntrusted(3) means the certificate is invalid
        because it has been provisioned (in the
        docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCert table) to be untrusted.
     InvalidCAUntrusted(4) means the certificate is invalid
        because it chains to an untrusted certificate.
     InvalidCmOther(5) and InvalidCAOther(6) refer to
        errors in parsing, validity periods, etc., which are
        attributable to the CM certificate or its chain,
        respectively; additional information may be found
        in docsBpi2AuthRejectErrorString for these types
        of errors."
     REFERENCE
          "DOCSIS Baseline Privacy Plus Interface Specification,
     Section 9.4.2."
     ::= { docsBpi2CmtsAuthEntry 19 }

contents.text: 7. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 安全考虑

contents.text: There are a number of management objects defined in this MIB module with a MAX-ACCESS clause of read-write and/or read-create. Such objects may be considered sensitive or vulnerable in some network environments. The support for SET operations in a non-secure environment without proper protection can have a negative effect on network operations. These are the tables and objects and their sensitivity/vulnerability:
contents.zh-CHS: 此MIB模块中定义了许多管理对象，其MAX-ACCESS子句为read-write和/或read-create。在某些网络环境中，此类对象可能被视为敏感或易受攻击。在没有适当保护的非安全环境中支持SET操作可能会对网络操作产生负面影响。以下是表和对象及其敏感度/漏洞：

contents.text: - The following objects, if SNMP SET maliciously, could constitute denial of service or theft of service attacks or compromise the intended data privacy of users:
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果恶意设置SNMP，则以下对象可能构成拒绝服务或窃取服务攻击，或损害用户的预期数据隐私：

contents.text: Objects related to the Baseline Privacy Key Management (BPKM)
contents.zh-CHS: 与基线隐私密钥管理（BPKM）相关的对象

contents.text: docsBpi2CmAuthReset, docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmReset, docsBpi2CmtsTEKReset: These objects are used for initiating a re-key process. A malicious massive SET attack may cause CMTS processing overload and may compromise the service.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmAuthReset、DOCSBPI2CMTSUTHCMRESET、DOCSBPI2CMTSTTEKRESET：这些对象用于启动重新设置密钥的过程。恶意大规模SET攻击可能导致CMTS处理过载，并可能危及服务。

contents.text: docsBpi2CmtsDefaultAuthLifetime, docsBpi2CmtsDefaultTEKLifetime, docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmLifetime, docsBpi2CmtsTEKLifetime: To minimize the risk of malicious or unintended short periods of time when key updates may lead to degradation or denial of service, implementers are encouraged to follow these objects' range constraints, as defined in the docsBpi2CmtsCompliance MODULE-COMPLIANCE clause for operational deployments.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmtsDefaultAuthLifetime、docsBpi2CmtsDefaultTEKLifetime、docsBpi2CmtsAuthCmLifetime、docsBpi2CmtsTEKLifetime：为了最大限度地降低关键更新可能导致降级或拒绝服务的恶意或意外短时间风险，鼓励实施者遵循这些对象的范围限制，如操作部署的DOCSBPI2CMTS合规模块合规条款所定义。

contents.text: docsBpi2CmtsDefaultSelfSignedManufCertTrust: A malicious SET in a self-signed certificate as reject message, which may constitute denial of service. This object is designed for testing purposes; therefore, it is not RECOMMENDED for use in commercial deployments [DOCSIS]. Administrators can make use of View-based Access Control (VACM) introduced in section 7.9 of [RFC3410] to restrict write access to this object.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmtsDefaultSelfSignedManufCertTrust：自签名证书中恶意设置为拒绝消息，可能构成拒绝服务。该对象设计用于测试目的；因此，不建议将其用于商业部署[DOCSIS]。管理员可以使用[RFC3410]第7.9节中介绍的基于视图的访问控制（VACM）来限制对此对象的写入访问。

contents.text: docsBpi2CmtsCheckCertValidityPeriods: A malicious SET in this object that enables the period validity and a wrong clock time in the CMTS could cause denial of service, as CM authorization requests will be rejected.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmtsCheckCertValidityPeriods：此对象中的恶意设置启用CMTS中的有效期和错误时钟时间，可能会导致拒绝服务，因为CM授权请求将被拒绝。

contents.text: For more details in the validation of CM certificates, refer to section 9 of [DOCSIS] .
contents.zh-CHS: 有关CM证书验证的更多详细信息，请参阅[DOCSIS]第9节。

contents.text: Objects related to the CM only:
contents.zh-CHS: 仅与CM相关的对象：

contents.text: Objects in docsBpi2CmDeviceCertTable
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmDeviceCertTable中的对象

contents.text: docsBpi2CmDeviceCmCert: This object is not harmful, considering that a CM received a Certificate during the manufacturing process. Therefore, the object access becomes read-only. See the object DESCRIPTION clause in section 3 for details.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmDeviceCmCert：考虑到CM在制造过程中收到了证书，该对象是无害的。因此，对象访问变为只读。有关详细信息，请参见第3节中的对象描述条款。

contents.text: Objects for Secure Software Download in table docsBpi2CodeDownloadControl:
contents.zh-CHS: 表docsBpi2CodeDownloadControl中用于安全软件下载的对象：

contents.text: docsBpi2CodeCvcUpdate: A malicious SET on this object may not constitute a risk, since the CM holds the DOCSIS root key to verify the CVC authenticity. The operator, if configured, could receive a notification for event occurrences, which may lead to detecting the source of the attack. Moreover, [DOCSIS] recommends that CMs CVC be regularly updated to minimize the risk of potential code-signing keys being compromised (e.g., by configuration file).
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CodeCvcUpdate：此对象上的恶意设置可能不会构成风险，因为CM持有DOCSIS根密钥以验证CVC的真实性。操作员（如果已配置）可能会收到事件发生的通知，这可能导致检测到攻击源。此外，[DOCSIS]建议定期更新CMs CVC，以最大限度地降低潜在代码签名密钥被泄露的风险（例如，通过配置文件）。

contents.text: Objects related to the CMTS only:
contents.zh-CHS: 仅与CMT相关的对象：

contents.text: Objects in docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTable and docsBpi2CmtsCACertTable containing CM Certificates and Certificate Authority information, respectively:
contents.zh-CHS: docsbpi2cmtsfrovisionedcmcertable和docsbpi2cmtscaertable中分别包含CM证书和证书颁发机构信息的对象：

contents.text: docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTrust, docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertStatus, docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCert, docsBpi2CmtsCACertStatus, docsBpi2CmtsCACert: A malicious SET on these objects may constitute a denial of service attack that will be experienced after the CMs perform authorization requests. It does not affect CMs in the authorized state.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTrust、docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertStatus、docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertStatus、DocsBPI2cmtsCcertStatus、DocsBPI2cmtsCcert：这些对象上的恶意集可能构成拒绝服务攻击，在CMs执行授权请求后会遇到这种攻击。它不影响处于授权状态的CMs。

contents.text: Objects in multicast tables docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapTable and docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthTable:
contents.zh-CHS: 多播表docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapTable和DOCSBPI2CMTSMMulticastAuthTable中的对象：

contents.text: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddressType, docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddress, docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMaskType,
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddressType，docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastAddress，docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMaskType，

contents.text: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMask, docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAId, docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAType: Malicious SET on these objects may cause misconfiguration, causing interruption of the users' active multicast applications.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMask，docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastSAId，DocsBPI2CMTSIPmulticastType：这些对象上的恶意设置可能会导致配置错误，导致用户的活动多播应用程序中断。

contents.text: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataEncryptAlg, docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataAuthentAlg: Malicious SETs on these objects may create service misconfiguration, causing service interruption or theft of service if encryption algorithms are removed for the multicast groups.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastDataEncryptAlg、DOCSBPI2CMTSIPmulticastDataAuthentilg：如果删除多播组的加密算法，这些对象上的恶意集可能会造成服务配置错误，导致服务中断或服务被盗。

contents.text: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapControl, docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthControl: Malicious SETs on these objects may remove and/or disable customers and/or multicast groups, causing service disruption. This may also constitute theft of service by authorizing non-subscribed users to multicast groups or by adding other multicast groups in the forward path.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmtsIpMulticastMapControl、DOCSBPI2CMTSMMulticastAuthControl：这些对象上的恶意集可能会删除和/或禁用客户和/或多播组，从而导致服务中断。通过授权未订阅的用户加入多播组或在转发路径中添加其他多播组，这也可能构成服务盗窃。

contents.text: Some of the readable objects in this MIB module (i.e., objects with a MAX-ACCESS other than not-accessible) may be considered sensitive or vulnerable in some network environments. It is thus important to control even GET and/or NOTIFY access to these objects and possibly to even encrypt the values of these objects when sending them over the network via SNMP. These are the tables and objects and their sensitivity/vulnerability:
contents.zh-CHS: 在某些网络环境中，此MIB模块中的某些可读对象（即具有MAX-ACCESS而非not ACCESS的对象）可能被视为敏感或易受攻击。因此，在通过SNMP通过网络发送这些对象时，控制甚至获取和/或通知对这些对象的访问，甚至可能加密这些对象的值，这一点非常重要。以下是表和对象及其敏感度/漏洞：

contents.text: Objects in docsBpi2CmBaseTable, docsBpi2CmTEKTable, docsBpi2CmtsBaseTable, docsBpi2CmtsAuthTable, docsBpi2CmtsTEKTable, docsBpi2CmtsProvisionedCmCertTable, and docsBpi2CmtsCACertTable: If this information is accessible, attackers may use it to distinguish users configured to work without data encryption (e.g., docsBpi2CmPrivacyEnable) and to know current Baseline Privacy parameters in the network.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmBaseTable、docsBpi2CmTEKTable、docsBpi2CmtsBaseTable、docsbpi2cmtauthTable、docsBpi2CmtsTEKTable、docsbpi2cmtprovisionedcmcerttable和docsBpi2CmtsCACertTable中的对象：如果可以访问此信息，攻击者可能会使用它来区分配置为在没有数据加密的情况下工作的用户（例如docsbpi2cmprivacyeble）以及了解网络中的当前基线隐私参数。

contents.text: Objects in docsBpi2CmIpMulticastMapTable and docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthTable: In addition to the vulnerabilities around BPI plus multicast objects described in the previous part, the read-only objects of this table may help attackers monitor the status of the intrusion.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CmIpMulticastMapTable和docsBpi2CmtsMulticastAuthTable中的对象：除了上一部分描述的BPI plus多播对象周围的漏洞外，此表的只读对象可能有助于攻击者监控入侵状态。

contents.text: Objects in docsBpi2CodeDownloadControl: In addition to the vulnerability of the read-write object docsBpi2CodeCvcUpdate, attackers may be able to monitor the status of a denial of service using Secure Software Download.
contents.zh-CHS: docsBpi2CodeDownloadControl中的对象：除了读写对象docsBpi2CodeCvcUpdate的漏洞外，攻击者还可以使用安全软件下载监控拒绝服务的状态。

contents.text: SNMP versions prior to SNMPv3 did not include adequate security. Even if the network itself is secure (for example by using IPSec), even then, there is no control as to who on the secure network is allowed to access and GET/SET (read/change/create/delete) the objects in this MIB module.
contents.zh-CHS: SNMPv3之前的SNMP版本未包含足够的安全性。即使网络本身是安全的（例如通过使用IPSec），即使如此，也无法控制安全网络上的谁可以访问和获取/设置（读取/更改/创建/删除）此MIB模块中的对象。

contents.text: It is RECOMMENDED that implementers consider the security features as provided by the SNMPv3 framework (see [RFC3410], section 8), including full support for the SNMPv3 cryptographic mechanisms (for authentication and privacy).
contents.zh-CHS: 建议实施者考虑SNMPv3框架所提供的安全特性（参见[RCFC310]，第8节），包括对SNMPv3加密机制的完全支持（用于身份验证和隐私）。

contents.text: Further, deployment of SNMP versions prior to SNMPv3 is NOT RECOMMENDED. Instead, it is RECOMMENDED to deploy SNMPv3 and to enable cryptographic security. It is then a customer/operator responsibility to ensure that the SNMP entity giving access to an instance of this MIB module is properly configured to give access to the objects only to those principals (users) that have legitimate rights to indeed GET or SET (change/create/delete) them.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，不建议部署SNMPv3之前的SNMP版本。相反，建议部署SNMPv3并启用加密安全性。然后，客户/运营商应负责确保授予访问此MIB模块实例权限的SNMP实体已正确配置为仅授予那些拥有确实获取或设置（更改/创建/删除）对象的合法权限的主体（用户）访问对象。

contents.text: BPI+ Encryption Algorithms:
contents.zh-CHS: BPI+加密算法：

contents.text: The BPI+ Traffic Encryption Keys (TEK) defined in the DOCSIS BPI+ specification [DOCSIS] use 40-bit or 56-bit DES for encryption (DES CBC mode). Currently, there is no mechanism or algorithm defined for data integrity.
contents.zh-CHS: DOCSIS BPI+规范[DOCSIS]中定义的BPI+流量加密密钥（TEK）使用40位或56位DES进行加密（DES CBC模式）。目前，没有为数据完整性定义任何机制或算法。

contents.text: Due to the DES cryptographic weaknesses, future revisions of the DOCSIS BPI+ specification should introduce more advanced encryption algorithms, as proposed in the DocsBpkmDataEncryptAlg textual convention, to overcome the progress in cheaper and faster hardware or software decryption tools. Future revisions of the DOCSIS BPI+ specification [DOCSIS] should also adopt authentication algorithms, as described in the DocsBpkmDataAuthentAlg textual convention.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于DES加密的弱点，DOCSIS BPI+规范的未来修订版应引入DocsBpkmDataEncryptAlg文本约定中提出的更高级的加密算法，以克服硬件或软件解密工具更便宜更快的进展。DOCSIS BPI+规范[DOCSIS]的未来版本还应采用DOCSBPKMDataAuthentialg文本约定中所述的身份验证算法。

contents.text: It is important to note that frequent key changes do not necessarily help in mitigating or reducing the risks of a DES attack. Indeed, the traffic encryption keys, which are configured on a per cable modem basis and per BPI+ multicast group, can be utilized to decrypt old traffic, even when they are no longer in active use.
contents.zh-CHS: 需要注意的是，频繁的关键更改不一定有助于降低DES攻击的风险。实际上，在每个电缆调制解调器和每个BPI+多播组上配置的流量加密密钥可用于解密旧流量，即使它们不再处于活动使用状态。

contents.text: Note that, not exempt to the same recommendations above, the CM BPI+ authorization protocol uses triple DES encryption, which offers improved robustness in comparison to DES for CM authorization and TEK re-key management.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，CM BPI+授权协议使用了三重DES加密，与DES相比，对于CM授权和TEK re密钥管理，它提供了更好的健壮性，但不排除上述相同建议。
